name: Snickerdoodle Cake I
author: KATEE2
summary: Sugar and cinnamon topping. Like the famous cookie, only BIGGER!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan
In a medium bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt
In a large bowl, cream shortening and 2 cups sugar until fluffy
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well with each addition
Alternately add milk and flour mixture in three stages, mixing well with each addition
In a small bowl, mix 3 tablespoons sugar with 1 teaspoon cinnamon
Sprinkle this mixture evenly over cake
Pour into prepared 9x13 inch pan and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 to 40 minutes or until done
